name: ReIncarnate (jchiledred)
description:
ReIncarnate is a rogue-like dungeon crawler with a single goal in mind: make it out.

You find yourself in a dungeon  laiden with traps , magical radiation constantly depleting your health , and probably way to aggressive slimes. But everytime you die you seem to arrive  back at the start. It's up to you to collect potions and relics and find your way out of the dungeon.

The game uses standard WASD control for movement and Shift to sprint left click to attack and the number keys :1 2 3 to activate potions collected in game.
